column2: UPDATE 3-Allergan to buy Tobira in push for fatty liver disease drugs Sept 20 Botox maker Allergan Plc
column3: in its third acquisition this month
column4: said it would pay up to $1.7 billion for Tobira Therapeutics Inc to get a leg up in the race to develop therapies for NASH
column5: an incurable fatty liver disease closely linked to obesity.

column4: Hyundai Card

column2: Florida sinkhole to cost Mosaic up to $50 million to fix Sept 20 A massive leak of contaminated water through a sinkhole at a Mosaic Co fertilizer facility in Florida will cost it $20 million to $50 million to fix
column3: a company executive said on Tuesday.

column2: Baltimore OKs finance deal for Under Armour CEO's $5.5 bln project Sept 20 Baltimore's city council gave final approval for a $660 million public financing package to help fund a $5.5 billion project for Under Armour Inc Chief Executive Kevin Plank's real estate company
column3: a council spokesman said on Tuesday.
